title: Awesome Shadcn UI
description: A curated list of awesome Shadcn UI libraries, resources and projects.

items.title: aceternity-ui
items.desc: Copy paste the most trending react components without having to worry about styling and animations.

items.title: assistant-ui
items.desc: React Components for AI Chat.

items.title: autocomplete-select-shadcn-ui
items.desc: Autocomplete component built with shadcn/ui and Fancy Multi Select by Maximilian Kaske.

items.title: auto-form
items.desc: A React component that automatically creates a shadcn/ui form based on a zod schema.

items.title: capture-photo
items.desc: Capture-Photo is a versatile, browser-based React component designed to streamline the integration of camera functionalities directly into your web applications.

items.title: clerk-elements
items.desc: Composable components that can be used to build custom UIs on top of Clerk's APIs.

items.title: clerk-shadcn-theme
items.desc: Easily synchronize your Clerk <SignIn /> and <SignUp /> components with your shadcn/ui styles.

items.title: confirm-dialog
items.desc: A confirm dialog component built with shadcn/ui.

items.title: country-state-dropdown
items.desc: This Component is built with Nextjs, Tailwindcss, shadcn/ui & Zustand for state management.

items.title: cult-ui
items.desc: A well curated set of animated shadcn-style React components for more specific use-cases.

items.title: credenza
items.desc: Ready-made responsive modal component for shadcn/ui.

items.title: date-range-picker-for-shadcn
items.desc: Includes multi-month views, text entry, preset ranges, responsive design, and date range comparisons.

items.title: downshift-shadcn-combobox
items.desc: Combobox/autocomplete component built with shadcn/ui and Downshift.

items.title: echo-editor
items.desc: A modern WYSIWYG rich-text editor base on tiptap and shadcn/ui

items.title: edil-ozi
items.desc: React components for developers. Gsap + framer motion + tailwind.

items.title: emblor
items.desc: A highly customizable, accessible, and fully-featured tag input component built with shadcn/ui.

items.title: enhanced-button
items.desc: An enhanced version of the default shadcn-button component.

items.title: fancy-area
items.desc: The Textarea is inspired by GitHub's PR comment section. The impressive part is the @mention support including hover cards in the preview. The goal is to reproduce it without text editor library.

items.title: fancy-box
items.desc: The Combobox is inspired by GitHub's PR label selector and is powered by shadcn/ui. Almost all elements are radix-ui components, styled with tailwindcss.

items.title: fancy-multi-select
items.desc: The Multi Select Component is inspired by campsite.design's and cal.com's settings forms.

items.title: farmui
items.desc: A shadcn and tailwindcss based beautifully styled and animated component library solution with its own npm package to install any component with in a component registery.

items.title: file-uploader
items.desc: A file uploader built with shadcn/ui and react-dropzone.

items.title: file-vault
items.desc: File upload component for React.

items.title: fusion-ui
items.desc: Fusion UI library combining shadcn/ui and MagicUI.

items.title: ibelick/background-snippet
items.desc: Ready to use collection of modern background snippets.

items.title: indie-ui
items.desc: UI components with variants - Docs

items.title: lukacho-ui
items.desc: Next Generation UI Components

items.title: magicui
items.desc: React components to build beautiful landing pages using tailwindcss + framer motion + shadcn/ui

items.title: maily.to
items.desc: Craft beautiful emails effortlessly with notion like powerful editor.

items.title: minimal-tiptap
items.desc: A minimal WYSIWYG editor built with shadcn/ui and tiptap.

items.title: mixcnui
items.desc: Mixui is a collection of animated or re-usable component currently for Nextjs.

items.title: mynaui
items.desc: TailwindCSS and shadcn/ui UI Kit for Figma and React.

items.title: neobrutalism-components
items.desc: Collection of neobrutalism-styled Tailwind React and Shadcn UI components.

items.title: nextjs-components
items.desc: A collection of Next.js components build with TypeScript, React, shadcn/ui, Craft UI, and Tailwind CSS.

items.title: nextjs-dnd
items.desc: Sortable Drag and Drop with Next.js, shadcn/ui, and dnd-kit.

items.title: novel
items.desc: Novel is a Notion-style WYSIWYG editor with AI-powered autocompletion. Built with Tiptap + Vercel AI SDK.

items.title: password-input
items.desc: shadcn/ui custom password input.

items.title: phone-input-shadcn-ui
items.desc: Custom phone number component built with shadcn/ui.

items.title: planner
items.desc: Planner is a highly adaptable scheduling component tailored for React applications.

items.title: plate
items.desc: The rich-text editor for React.

items.title: pricing-page-shadcn
items.desc: Pricing Page made with shadcn/ui & Next.js 14. Completely customizable.

items.title: progress-button
items.desc: An extension of shadcn/ui button component that uses a state machine to drive a progress UX.

items.title: react-dnd-kit-tailwind-shadcn-ui
items.desc: Drag and drop Accessible kanban board implementing using React, dnd-kit, tailwind, and shadcn/ui.

items.title: search-address
items.desc: The SearchAddress component provides a flexible and interactive search interface for addresses, utilizing the powerful Nominatim service from OpenStreetMap.

items.title: shadcn-blocks
items.desc: Blocks is the official shadcn/ui pre-made but customizable components that can be copied and pasted into your projects.

items.title: shadcn-cal
items.desc: A copy of the monthly calendar used by Cal.com with shadcn/ui, Radix Colors and React Aria.

items.title: shadcn-calendar-heatmap
items.desc: Modern alternative to primitive react heatmaps built on top of shadcn/ui calendar component.

items.title: shadcn-calendar-component
items.desc: A calendar date picker component designed with shadcn/ui.

items.title: shadcn-chat
items.desc: Customizable and reusable chat component for you to use in your projects.

items.title: shadcn-data-table-advanced-col-opions
items.desc: Column-resizing option to shadcn/ui DataTable.

items.title: shadcn-drag-table
items.desc: A drag-and-drop table component using shadcn/ui and Next.js.

items.title: shadcn-extends
items.desc: Intended to be a collection of components built using shadcn/ui.

items.title: shadcn-extension
items.desc: An open-source component collection that extends your UI library, built using shadcn/ui components.

items.title: shadcn-image-cropper
items.desc: A minimal image cropper UI built with shadcn and the react-image-crop library.

items.title: shadcn-linear-combobox
items.desc: A copy of the combobox that Linear uses to set the priority of a task.

items.title: shadcn-multi-select-component
items.desc: A multi-select component designed with shadcn/ui.

items.title: shadcn-phone-input-2
items.desc: Simple and formatted phone input component built with shadcn/ui y libphonenumber-js.

items.title: shadcn-phone-input
items.desc: Customizable phone input component with proper validation for any country.

items.title: shadcn-stepper
items.desc: A complete stepper component built with shadcn/ui.

items.title: shadcn-table-v2
items.desc: shadcn/ui table component with server-side sorting, filtering, and pagination.

items.title: shadcn-timeline
items.desc: Customizable and re-usable timeline component for you to use in your projects. Built on top of shadcn.

items.title: shadcn-ui-blocks
items.desc: A collection of Over 10+ fully responsive, UI blocks you can drop into your Shadcn UI projects and customize to your heart's content.

items.title: shadcn-ui-expansions
items.desc: A lots of useful components which shadcn/ui does not have out of the box.

items.title: shadcn-ui-sidebar
items.desc: A stunning, functional and responsive retractable sidebar built on top of shadcn/ui.

items.title: sortable
items.desc: A sortable component built with shadcn/ui, radix ui, and dnd-kit.

items.title: stocks
items.desc: Stock Picker using Next.js, React Server Components, and shadcn/ui charts.

items.title: time-picker
items.desc: A simple TimePicker for your shadcn/ui project.

items.title: tremor-raw
items.desc: Copy & paste React components to build modern web applications. Good for building charts.

items.title: uixmat/onborda
items.desc: Give your application the onboarding it deserves with Onborda product tour for Next.js

items.title: chat-with-youtube
items.desc: A chrome extension is designed to give you the ability to efficiently summarize videos, easily search for specific parts, and enjoy additional useful features.

items.title: designgui
items.desc: A Chrome Browser Extension for managing colors in CSS Variables.

items.title: raycast-shadcn
items.desc: Raycast extension to Browse shadcn/ui documentation, components and examples

items.title: shadcn-ui
items.desc: Add components from shadcn/ui directly from VS Code.

items.title: shadcn/ui Components Manager
items.desc: A plugin for Jetbrain products. It allows you to manage your shadcn/ui components across Svelte, React, Vue, and Solid frameworks with this plugin. Simplify tasks like adding, removing, and updating components.

items.title: vscode-shadcn-svelte
items.desc: VS Code extension for shadcn/ui components in Svelte projects.

items.title: vscode-shadcn-ui-snippets
items.desc: Easily import and use shadcn-ui components with ease using snippets within VSCode. Just type cn or shadcn in you jsx/tsx file and you will get a list of all the components to choose from.

items.title: vscode-shadcn-vue
items.desc: Extension for integrating shadcn/ui components into Vue.js projects.

items.title: 10000+Themes for shadcn/ui
items.desc: 10000+ Themes for shadcn/ui.

items.title: dizzy
items.desc: Bootstrap a new Next or Vite project with shadcn/ui. Customize font, icons, colors, spacing, radii, and shadows.

items.title: gradient-picker

items.title: navnote/rangeen

items.desc: POC - shadcn/ui themes with color pickers

items.title: zippy starter's shadcn/ui theme generator.
